catalog_info.title: Arabic Five
catalog_info.notes: Because the first day of fall 2015 FAS classes is following a Monday schedule, the first meeting of this class will be on Wednesday, September 2 . Course conducted solely in Arabic; all readings in Arabic.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Four years of Modern Arabic or equivalent level of proficiency.
catalog_info.description: Mahmoud Darwish. The course covers the nearly five decades of the Palestinian poet from the earliest years of production until his death in 2008. We will examine the contexts and themes of his work that pass through various periods, ranging from neo-classicism and free verse to the prose poem.
